extracted-table.table-caption: Cluster information of the global connectivity analysis results in cosmonauts.

caption.p: Cluster information of the global connectivity analysis results in cosmonauts.

table-wrap-foot.p: Peak voxels of clusters showing modulations in ICC values between various contrasts among the three scanning sessions in the cosmonaut cohort (preflight, postflight, follow-up). Brain region labeling was based on the Neuromorphometrics atlas. Beta values represent the effect size; T-values are cluster-averaged; p-cFWE: p-value after cluster-wise family-wise error (FWE) correction. This threshold was set at p < 0.05. df = degrees of freedom. R = right, L = Left. Bold fonts are used as headers to define the exact test that was performed.

extracted-table.table-caption: Cluster information of seed-based connectivity analyses.

caption.p: Cluster information of seed-based connectivity analyses.

tr.td: Seed: Angular gyrus, R (sustained increases: contrast [−1 0.5 0.5]) (df = 10)
Seed: Angular gyrus, R (sustained decreases: contrast [1 −0.5 −0.5]) (df = 10)

table-wrap-foot.p: A seed-based connectivity analysis was run with the resulting clusters from the global connectivity analysis as seed regions. The contrast tested is included for each of the seeds. Beta values represent a measure for effect size; T-values are cluster-averaged; p-cFWE is the p-value after cluster-wise family-wise error (FWE) correction. This threshold was set at p < 0.05. Bold fonts are used as headers to define the exact test that was performed.

extracted-table.table-caption: Demographic information of the cosmonaut and control groups (all males).

caption.p: Demographic information of the cosmonaut and control groups (all males).

table-wrap-foot.p: The last column represents the results of the Mann–Whitney U test comparing age and scan intervals between cosmonauts and controls.
